Xindi Wang

I’m a Network Science PhD student at Network Science Institute, Northeastern University, working with Prof. Albert-László Barabási and Prof. Tina Eliassi-Rad.

My research is in general on complex systems, specifically on network science and computational social science. I'm particularly interested in understanding how the social systems work from a data-driven perspective.

Maintained by Xindi Wang, with jekyll and Bootstrap.
